Posts.Content: ScaredandConfused80 wrote: I went to my local Urgent Care about a nickel sized knot I found. The doctor there recommended that I get a 3D mammogram and ultrasound done. The recommendations from that are that I need to have a left breast ultrasound to evaluate a 12mm nodule and an ultrasound guided right core biopsy for a 9mm complex nodule. This was my first time ever having a mammogram or ultrasound and to see the BI RAD 4 label my mind is spinning. I don’t know what this all means or how to proceed. Stressed out like I’ve never been and unsure of what’s next. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Where Do I Begin... ScaredandConfused80 ScaredandConfused80
